mapper.insert: insert into tb_news_blocking_words (shie_name, channel_id, enabling_status, is_deleted, create_user) value (#{shie_name},#{channel_id},#{enabling_status},#{is_deleted},#{create_user})
mapper.update: update tb_news_blocking_words set shie_name=#{shieName}, channel_id=#{channelId}, enabling_status=#{enablingStatus}, is_deleted=#{isDeleted}, update_user=#{updateUser} where shie_id=#{shieId}
